content: this crochet coaster has 10 rounds and measures about 5 in diameter i used yarnart etamin acrylic thread 30 g 180 m but you can use any color or thread brand you d like the size of the finished doily depends on the yarn and hook that you crochet the crochet doily is easy to make and is perfect for beginners to crochet the description includes basic crochet elements single_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet slip_stitch chain stitch picot languages download includes two pdf files english and russian versions of the pattern the pattern consists of 5 pages of written instructions all files are allowed to be printed for personal use only please do not claim this pattern as your own sell or distribute it
